content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable, but I am looking to maximize my gains. What is your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you give me a price?

I am a student and want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible. I don't want to negotiate too much, but I am willing to negotiate if necessary. I am looking for a fair price.

Please let me know your final price.

TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand that you are a student and want to be on good terms with your landlord. Based on the 25 square meter size of the apartment and your dependability and responsibility, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 1,500 Euros per month. This price is fair and should meet your needs. Is this a price that works for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1500 Euros.

TERMINATE
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or need any further assistance with the rental process. I look forward to working with you as your landlord.
name: Heinrich Heine
